thread.title: Courteous stylish and clean
thread.title_full: Courteous stylish and clean - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: fire-by-night89
title: Courteous stylish and clean
text: I stopped here on two occasions in February. Both times the staff were very helpful but not ingratiating. The room and bathroom fitments were superior to the impression given on the photographs. The powerful shower was ideal after a long journey and I would love to know the suppliers of the pillows. The breakfast was of a similar high quality although the menu for evening meals was not adventurous. Only one underground stop from Kings Cross so I would certainly recommend for business travelers and those wanting a high standard of comfort,
